'''Curse''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Enchantments ===
* [[Curse of Binding]] - an enchantment used to prevent [[item]]s in the armor slots from being removed.
* [[Curse of Vanishing]] - an enchantment used on [[tool]]s, [[weapon]]s, and [[armor]], causing them to disappear when the owner [[die]]s.

=== Effects ===
* {{EffectLink|Bad Luck}} - an unused [[status effect]] that decreases player's {{code|luck}} [[attribute]], making chest loot less valuable.
* {{EffectLink|Bad Omen}} - a [[status effect]] that triggers a [[raid]] when the player enters a [[village]] and triggers an [[ominous trial]] when near a [[trial spawner]].
